list..num_tokens_context_div: Multiplicatively scale the number of observations in this context to this number.
list.#solve_button: Find best weights (sliders) given the observed counts (gray outlines). Regularization alters the definition of "best."
list.#new_challenge: Pick some new secret weights and use them to generate a new training dataset.  You can then try to estimate the weights given the dataset.
list.#new_counts: Resample the observed counts (gray outlines).  Replaces the training dataset with a new one of the same size, generated from the same conditional distribution.
list.#cheat_button: Indicate the weights of the true distribution, and its regularized log-likelihood.
list.#regularization_constant: Change the importance of the regularizer.
list.#gradient_step: Change how strongly you follow the gradient.
